content: Hello implementers, I just locally installed Hapi-Fhir, and was wondering what the good options are to have user authenticate before they can access the server. Maybe something that require both LDAP and Username-Password combination. Can you point me to the options available and if there's something better to use, I will be happy to know. Thanks for the anticipated help!

simple recipe:
Install Keycloak, create realm and users, use apache as auth reverse proxy whith mod_auth_openidc: https://github.com/zmartzone/mod_auth_openidc/wiki/Keycloak
